title: Meowkai
body: I thought of an amazing skin idea, Meowkai. It will basically be maokai but as a cat tower, he will throw balls of yarn and in his ult litter boxes are around him in his E he will become kitty litter. I think its a pretty good idea so rito please make this a skin and give it an award because it is amazing. Thank you

replies.body: I would probably buy it. Fun skins are always great to have, they can make even a horrible feeding game fun.

LOVE IT.

Yeah, he should be a scratching post that throws actual cats, and his Q dumps cat litter on them, his W makes him turn into a rolling ball of yarn, and his R is a big circle of spinning cat litter with balls of yarn swirling around in it. 
As far as difficulty in making, his Q and W would be pretty simple, but his E and R would be relatively hard, I'm thinking if Riot makes it the way explained above, it would be priced at 1350 RP.
Definitely would buy.

MORE CATS YES PLEASE.
He could literally be a walking scratching post instead. please.
